meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>inside</kanji> <kanji>ditch</kanji> is the inner ditch, or, if you make it awesome enough, the <vocabulary>inner moat</vocabulary>. If they get through the outer moat, we have the inner one, at least!
readingMnemonic: The reading is the kun'yomi / vocab readings of these kanji. 内 + 堀 added into one word.
